text: Moses guu kae nia dodo ala nogo i lodo nia baisin ga hagatulutulu digaula gi nia maa ga helekai, “Aanei nia dodo ala e hagamodongoohia bolo di hagababa le e donu, dela ne hai adu go Dimaadua i dana gowadu nia haganoho huogodoo aanei gi goodou.”24.8 Matthew 26.28; Mark 14.24; Luke 22.20; 1 Corinthians 11.25; Hebrews 9.19-20; 10.29
